p: Products of the mosquito COI barcoding and virus screening assays were cleaned up using PureLink PCR Purification Kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Hennigsdorf, Germany) and sequenced using forward-reverse primers of the particular assay and the BigDye Terminator v3.1 Cycle Sequencing Kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific) in an ABI PRISM 3500xL Dx genetic analyzer (Thermo Fisher Scientific).
